component.name: Emoji Mart
component.summary: A modern popup emoji picker, based on the Emoji Mart web component.

description.p: Modern emoji picker popup for desktop, based on the Emoji Mart web component.
Launch the emoji picker with your system custom shortcuts `Alt+Space`, and select emojis to paste in the clipboard.
